Class IDocDocumentListHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.sap.IDocDocumentListHelper

  • public class IDocDocumentListHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Convenience methods for working with IDocDocumentList objects.

    • Constructor Summary

      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private IDocDocumentListHelper()
      Disallow instantiation of this class.

      Creates a new IDocDocumentList using the given no argument constructor.
      private static com.sap.conn.idoc.IDocDocumentList construct(com.sap.conn.idoc.IDocDocumentList other)
      Creates a new IDocDocumentList using the given IDocDocumentList's class's no argument constructor.
      static com.sap.conn.idoc.IDocDocumentList identify(com.sap.conn.idoc.IDocDocumentList list)
      For each IDoc in the give IDocDocumentList, assigns the list index as the respective DOCNUM.
      static com.sap.conn.idoc.IDocDocumentList[] partition(com.sap.conn.idoc.IDocDocumentList list, int limit)
      Partitions the given IDocDocumentList into an IDocDocumentList[] whose lengths are at most the given limit, and whose items are the respective items from the given IDocDocumentList.

    • Method Detail

      • identify

        public static com.sap.conn.idoc.IDocDocumentList identify(com.sap.conn.idoc.IDocDocumentList list)
                                                   throws com.sap.conn.idoc.IDocConversionException,
                                                          com.sap.conn.idoc.IDocSyntaxException
        For each IDoc in the give IDocDocumentList, assigns the list index as the respective DOCNUM.
        Parameters:
        list - The list whose items are to be processed.
        Returns:
        The given list with each item assigned a DOCNUM equal to its list index.
        Throws:
        com.sap.conn.idoc.IDocConversionException - If an error occurs.
        com.sap.conn.idoc.IDocSyntaxException - If an error occurs.

      • partition

        public static com.sap.conn.idoc.IDocDocumentList[] partition(com.sap.conn.idoc.IDocDocumentList list,
                                                             int limit)
                                                      throws com.sap.conn.idoc.IDocConversionException,
                                                             com.sap.conn.idoc.IDocSyntaxException,
                                                             com.sap.conn.idoc.IDocIllegalTypeException
        Partitions the given IDocDocumentList into an IDocDocumentList[] whose lengths are at most the given limit, and whose items are the respective items from the given IDocDocumentList.
        Parameters:
        list - The list to be partitioned.
        limit - The maximum length of each IDocDocumentList in the returned IDocDocumentList[].
        Returns:
        An IDocDocumentList[] containing the items from the given IDocDocumentList, partitioned by the given limit.
        Throws:
        com.sap.conn.idoc.IDocConversionException - If an error occurs.
        com.sap.conn.idoc.IDocSyntaxException - If an error occurs.
        com.sap.conn.idoc.IDocIllegalTypeException - If an error occurs.

        Parameters:
        other - An IDocDocumentList whose class's no argument constructor is to be used to create a new object.
        Returns:
